regen.absent_element: assignment of passwords to staff members
regen.new_specification: The configuration option shall allow passwords to be assigned to each defined staff member.
The system shall provide functionality to assign passwords to each staff member as part of their security profile.
The system shall allow System Administrators to assign passwords to each staff member as part of modifying security settings.

label: The configuration option shall allow a security level and password to be assigned to each defined staff member.
absence: a password to be assigned to each staff member
